onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Hey everyone, it's great to see you guys again!

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Yeah, how's everybody doing? Are you guys excited for our final term of the program?

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: Yup, I'm glad that we are almost finished. Just a few more weeks and we will get our diploma.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Not gonna lie, I wouldn't mind staying for a few more terms. The program has been pretty cool so far (except for that one course).

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Well, I just want to get it done and spend more time with my family. The work load has been gigantic. I hope that whichever job I get won't be as busy as BCIT.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: For me, I'm going to start setting up my business as soon as possible. Time waits for no one and the e-commerce market is getting really exciting right now.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: It always astound me how energetic you guys are. Must be the power of youth eh? I just want a change in career while you want to be a businesswoman and Tony wants to work for a big tech company.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Not just any big tech companies, the top 3 at least. Google, Amazon, Facebook,... I don't mind working for startups but I want to be where the smartest programmers are. I want to code big and important things.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: Well, it wouldn't matter what our plans are if we don't pass this course. I think the work we have to do will be harder than anything we ever faced.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Laura is right. We have to work together to finish this program. The workload is too big for any of us to handle alone.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Robert
onStartDialogue.speech: Laura, can you start setting group studies sessions? Just let us know when and where they are when you have it.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Laura
onStartDialogue.speech: Already on it. I'll have the schedule and handle the room booking for the rest of the term. Speaking of schedule, I think our class is starting soon.

onStartDialogue.speaker: Tony
onStartDialogue.speech: Yeah, let's get to class guys. It's time to learn some more code!!

tutorial.speaker: Help
tutorial.speech: Click on the 'Skills' button below and click on a skill. You can use that skill on targets that are not grayed out
